A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately many fans fail to realize the brilliance of Rian's Rashomon sequence and how well written this film actually was. Like the original Star Wars films\, he pulled this concept directly from Akira Kurasowa. Kurasowa's film Rachomon is the story of a rape and murder told from three different perspectives\, each with their own view on how the events took place. In The Last Jedi we see Luke confront Ben three times\, each from a different perspective. The way Luke wanted it to go (if at all)\, the way Ben felt it went\, and the last perspective is probably the closest to the truth in my opinion. Either way it was a brilliant way to tie in a well know Kirasowa theme and film. Unfortunately I think too many fans are fooled by the second perspective (of Ben) which simply portrays Luke as the villain (which was likely not the way the events actually transpired). https://youtu.be/fDYvG_P3MnU
